ygData.subject: Re: Baking for profit
ygData.msgSnippet: Depending on your skill, charisma, faction and mousing ability you can churn out fish fillets and make money.  I only found this since I was making fillets to
ygData.messageBody:
Depending on your skill, charisma, faction and mousing ability you can
churn out fish fillets and make money. I only found this since I was
making fillets to raise to (82). This is basically the same as Turgims
Fierce Brew in brewing, which I have found will make about the same
plat if you want it.

I'm looking for what to bake to raise my skill and what items may have
benefits to them. The reason I don't care about telling people there
is profit to be made is, it really doesn't hurt anyone, at least some
people will camp the ovens instead of MOB camps. 8)

Besides you will tire of it after about 10-20 plat hehe,
Samiba Craftsman

--- makaspro@... wrote:
> From: makaspro@...
>
> From an earlier post, OT
>
> >If all you want to do is a trade to make money,
> >pottery is not the one.
> >Baking is a good one, up to 30 plat an hour
>
> What do you bake to make 30p an hour? I started
> pottery to make pie tins and pots for my baking
> skills. But so far with baking the most complicated
> stuff I've made are fish rolls, and they don't have
> much profit.
>
> Sorry I know this is kinda off topic.
>
> Kizik
> Master Brewer, Potter, and Baker
>
